QuestData.Title: Vessels of the Spirit
QuestData.Description: The Spiritclaws are a sect of mogu assassin-priests who, at the height of the mogu empire, were the most elite and most feared of the emperor's troops.$B$BAll have mastered a deathblow which ensnares the spirit of the enemy, trapping it in a jade bottle for delivery to a Spiritbinder.$B$BIf you encounter any Spiritclaws further ahead in the ruins, take note: their belts hang with a cursed weight.$B$BRelieve them of their burden and bring the bottles back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 8 Spirit Bottles from Shan'ze Spiritclaws in the Terrace of Ten Thunders.
QuestData.CompletionText: To think the mogu have continued training the Spiritclaws for all these years...$B$BDid you get the bottles?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $c.$B$BI can already sense the spirits within these bottles - they cry out with fear, confusion... rage.
